output:
Waiting
Waiting
The hour is aching
And I hold my hands tight
And I wish I'm a ghost now
Running
Like it's better than flying
The circles in my mind
Are the worst ever always
Get up, say it out loud
Sing your heart out
Make your voice so strong to fill the air
These words need to be said
They need to be heard
Darling, you're so good, but it's too late
My hand will touch your hand
Am I a friend?
Or is this the end now?
But I'll wait till the world will go round
Sometimes touch the ground
Breathe in, breathe out
Breathe in, breathe out
Struggling
It is hard to become strong
If you never had been one
If you never had lost love
Running
Still it's better than drowning

Are the best ever always

These words need to be said
